meanings.definition: Make great efforts to achieve or obtain something.
meanings.sent1: She is striving to improve her grades in school.
meanings.sent2: The athletes are striving to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: The little ant was striving to carry a huge crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent4: The determined student was striving against all odds to pass the exam.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower was striving towards the sunlight for growth.

meanings.sent1: The workers are striving for fair wages.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers are striving against the enemy forces.
meanings.sent3: The cat was striving playfully with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The waves were striving against the shore during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The flames were striving to consume everything in their path.
